text: Yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 95. Should any bhikkhunī ask a question (about the Suttas, Vinaya, or Abhidhamma) of a bhikkhu who has not given leave, it is to be confessed.
